review: I have to say I am enjoying my Fire TV Stick.  For the value, it definitely delivers with a smooth interface, making navigation pretty intuitive.  My only gripe is that I bought this not only to enjoy Netflix, Amazon Prime & Spotify, but for Vimeo.  Which makes me wonder who's the culprit for it's consistent buffering while watching short videos.  Everything else streams just fine, so I'm not sure what to make of it besides hope there's an update of some sort that will fix it.  Otherwise this works great hooked up to my AV Receiver and I used all the accessories that were provided (HDMI Extender, USB Cable & USB wall plug).  I use this on a 1080p dumb tv and put the settings on the fire stick to a 720p output in hopes that the streaming demand would help speed up Vimeo, but it still looks great and I've left it that way.  Hope this review helps some people out there on choosing whether to buy or not buy the Fire TV Stick.
author: Spunos
